```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(visNetwork)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}

# Still learning visNetwork, having trouble figuring out how to
# create the groups and tie them to each student

nodes <- responses_clean %>% 
  select(id)
edges <- responses_clean %>% 
  filter(location == "The Yard") %>% 
  mutate(from = id) %>%
  mutate(to = location) %>%
  select(id, from, to)

visNetwork(nodes, edges)
```

```{r}

# List of most connected people and how many times they're listed

most_connected_list <- as.data.frame(table(responses_clean$most_connected)) %>% 
  rename(Person = Var1) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Freq))

# List of 1st closest people and how many times they're listed

p1_list <- as.data.frame(table(responses_clean$p1_name)) %>% 
  rename(Person = Var1) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Freq))

# List of 2nd closest people and how many times they're listed

p2_list <- as.data.frame(table(responses_clean$p2_name)) %>% 
  rename(Person = Var1) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Freq))

# List of 3rd closest people and how many times they're listed
```
